name: Spell Script Index?
comment: Possibly pointers to spell behavior routines.

name: Spell Script (Monster)
comment: Monsters appear to use a separate set of spell behavior functions?

name: Loot Index
comment: Virtual table containing all of [items, weapons, armor]. Used for crossreferences.

name: Spell Index
comment: The spell-data index appears to be much longer than stated (150+ entries?), but the corresponding spell routine array is much shorter. The extra entries may not do anything.

name: Character Name Index
comment: This table is used for the default names during character creation, but there are other copies in the ROM; I'm not sure where or how they're used.

name: Character Spells
comment: The spell set and spell level structures are interlaced. Possibly a joint struct, but they have separate indexes.

name: Spell GFX Pointers?
comment: Pointers to spell graphics information, I think.

name: Loot
comment: Virtual table containing all of [items, weapons, armor]. Used for crossreferences.

name: Monsters
comment: There are many unused monster entries; it may be easy to add more.
